bulkEdit.infoBanner: Select which fields to apply to {{ fileCount }} selected file(s). Only checked fields will be updated.
bulkEdit.helperText: Type and press Enter to add each item.

metadataPicker.copyMissingTooltip: Copy missing fields from fetched metadata
metadataPicker.overwriteAllTooltip: Overwrite all fields with fetched metadata
metadataPicker.resetAllTooltip: Reset all fields to original values
metadataPicker.unableToFetchMetadata: Unable to fetch metadata for this file
metadataPicker.confirmResetMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all metadata changes made to this file?

fileReview.title: Review Bookdrop Files
fileReview.description: These files were uploaded to the Bookdrop Folder. Review their fetched metadata, assign a library and subpath, and finalize where they belong in your collection.
fileReview.rescanTooltip: Manually trigger a rescan of the Bookdrop folder
fileReview.savingMessage: Organizing and moving files to their designated libraries. Please wait...
fileReview.importMetadataTooltip: Import fetched metadata for selected files
fileReview.includeCoversTooltip: Include book covers when importing fetched metadata
fileReview.bulkEditTooltip: Edit metadata fields in bulk for selected files
fileReview.extractPatternTooltip: Extract metadata from selected filenames using a pattern
fileReview.specifyLibraryTooltip: Specify library and subpath for selected files
fileReview.applyLibraryTooltip: Apply library and subpath to selected files
fileReview.noMetadataTooltip: No fetched metadata available. Original metadata will be used.
fileReview.metadataNotAppliedTooltip: Fetched metadata hasn't been applied yet. Open metadata picker to review.
fileReview.selectAllTooltip: Select all files across all pages
fileReview.clearTooltip: Deselect all files across all pages
fileReview.resetTooltip: Discard all changes made to metadata of selected files
fileReview.deleteTooltip: Permanently delete selected Bookdrop files and discard any changes
fileReview.finalizeTooltip: Move selected files into the chosen library and subpath

toast.noFilesResetDetail: Please select files to reset metadata.
toast.noFilesBulkEditDetail: Please select files to bulk edit.
toast.noFilesExtractDetail: Please select files to extract metadata from.
toast.confirmResetMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all metadata changes made to the selected files?
toast.confirmFinalizeMessage: Are you sure you want to finalize the import of {{ count }} file(s)?
toast.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {{ count }} selected Bookdrop file(s)? This action cannot be undone.
toast.filesDeletedDetail: Selected Bookdrop files were deleted successfully.
toast.deleteFailedDetail: An error occurred while deleting Bookdrop files.
toast.importCompleteDetail: Import process finished. See details below.
toast.importFailedDetail: Some files could not be moved. Please check the console for more details.
toast.rescanTriggeredDetail: Bookdrop rescan has been started successfully.
toast.rescanFailedDetail: Unable to trigger bookdrop rescan. Please try again.
toast.bulkEditAppliedDetail: Updated metadata for {{ success }} of {{ total }} file(s).
toast.bulkEditFailedDetail: An error occurred while applying bulk edits.
toast.bulkEditCacheFailedDetail: An error occurred while loading files into cache.
toast.patternExtractionAppliedDetail: Applied extracted metadata to {{ count }} file(s).
toast.patternExtractionCacheFailedDetail: An error occurred while loading files into cache.

patternExtract.infoBanner: Enter a pattern to extract metadata from filenames of {{ fileCount }} selected file(s). Use placeholders like {{ '{' }}SeriesName{{ '}' }} to capture values.
patternExtract.previewAriaLabel: Preview pattern extraction on sample files
patternExtract.patternDidNotMatchStructure: Pattern did not match filename structure

placeholders.wildcard: Wildcard - skips any text (not a metadata field)
placeholders.title: Book title
placeholders.subtitle: Book subtitle

toast.extractionCompleteDetail: Successfully extracted metadata from {{ success }} of {{ total }} files.
toast.extractionFailedDetail: An error occurred during pattern extraction.
